title: fragments
description: Dive into this emotional collection of poetry inspired by breaking the stigma surrounding mental health and exploring fragments of our emotions. Ideal for fans of Rupi Kaur - fragments is a must-read on your list of upcoming poetry books.fragments explores feelings and emotions towards body image and gender, self-love, boundaries, addiction recovery, depression and mental health, and more. Climb into yourself as you devour the fragments you didn't realize have been inside of you this entire time. We can put them back together.
author: Chelsey Alexandra
